summary:
Football, or soccer, is a global sport played by two teams with 11 players each. The aim is to score goals by kicking a ball into the opponent's net. The game is 90 minutes long, divided into two 45-minute halves. With over 250 million players, it's the most popular sport worldwide.

The rules, known as the Laws of the Game, are managed by FIFA and followed by six continental confederations. These rules cover everything from player positions to how goals are scored and disallowed. Internationally, the FIFA World Cup is the most prestigious tournament, attracting billions of viewers.
title: Association football
